TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsOneOf extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

Docs.summary: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken. You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects or arrays of <xref:System.String> objects. Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A> property to access the alternative items in the list.
The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can construct an instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class from an array of <xref:System.String> objects, from an array of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects, or as an empty list. Using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects instead of <xref:System.String> objects in a list of alternatives lets you apply properties of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> to each item in the list, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MinRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.MaxRepeat%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.RepeatProbability%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Weight%2A>.

Docs.param: The item to add to the list of alternatives.
Docs.summary: Adds an containing a word or a phrase to the list of alternatives.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As Collection(Of SrgsItem)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> or <xref:System.String> objects.
